whyUs.headline: Tasheel is an integrated platform
whyUs.description: Tasheel is an integrated platform for individuals and businesses to complete official services with ease and confidence: passport & ID issuance/renewals, international driving licenses, legal translation, and submission & follow-up with ministries and municipalities—delivered fast, accurately, and securely via our app and website.

features.feature1Description: Renew licenses, request permits, and manage official certificates online.
features.feature2Description: Order legal, medical, and academic translations with sworn translators and stamped deliverables.
features.feature3Description: Handle embassy legalization, ministry attestations, and corporate filings with guaranteed compliance.

featuresList.headline: Built for individuals and businesses
featuresList.subHeadline: Whether you're renewing a license or managing corporate documents, Tasheel provides the tools you need.
featuresList.feature1Content: Submit multiple service requests, upload documents, and manage everything from a single dashboard with full audit trail.
featuresList.feature2Content: Check status, receive notifications, and download completed documents from any device—desktop, mobile, or tablet.
featuresList.feature3Content: Track processing times, success rates, and spending across all your requests to optimize your document workflow.

faq.headline: Frequently asked
faq.subHeadline: Everything you need to know about Tasheel's government services
faq.question1: How long does document attestation take?
faq.answer1: Processing time varies by service and country. Palestinian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates (MOFAE) attestation typically takes 5-7 business days. Foreign document attestation (home country + Palestinian embassy + MOFAE) takes 10-20 business days depending on the country. Express service is available for urgent requests.
faq.question2: Do you offer free pickup and delivery?
faq.answer2: Yes! We offer free document pickup and delivery within Ramallah and Bethlehem. For other West Bank cities or Gaza, we can arrange insured courier service at a nominal fee. After you submit a quote request, our team will coordinate pickup at your convenience.
faq.question3: Can I track my order status online?
faq.answer3: Absolutely. Once your order is confirmed, you'll receive a tracking number. Visit our Track Status page or use the link in your confirmation email to see real-time updates. You'll also receive SMS and email notifications at every stage of processing.
faq.question4: What documents do I need for driver's license renewal?
faq.answer4: You'll need: copy of your existing driver's license, Palestinian ID card, passport copy, and a recent vision test certificate (we can arrange this for you). If you're employed, you may also need a no objection letter from your sponsor. Our team will verify all requirements when you submit your request.
faq.question5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer5: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and online payments. Payment is typically required after we provide you with a detailed quote and before we begin processing. For corporate clients, we offer invoice-based billing with NET 30 terms.
faq.question6: Is express service available for urgent requests?
faq.answer6: Yes, express processing is available for most services. Priority attestation can be completed in 2-3 business days, and same-day service is available for specific Ramallah-based ministries. Express fees vary by service type—request a quote for exact pricing and turnaround times.
faq.question7: How secure is my personal information and documents?
faq.answer7: We take security seriously. All documents are handled by verified staff, stored in secure facilities, and transported via insured courier. Your digital information is encrypted and stored on secure servers. We never share your personal data with third parties without your explicit consent.

About.headline: Simplifying government services, one document at a time
About.description:
Tasheel is your trusted partner for government services, document translation, and legalization. We believe that accessing government services shouldn't require hours of waiting in lines or navigating complex bureaucracy.

Our platform connects you directly with certified professionals who handle everything from driver's license renewals to embassy legalizations—all online, all secure, all transparent.

Founded with a mission to modernize how citizens and businesses interact with government services, Tasheel combines expert knowledge with cutting-edge technology to deliver fast, compliant, and hassle-free service delivery.

Partners.headline: Trusted by residents and businesses across Palestine

FeaturesGridRemote.headline: Powerful platform features that save you time
FeaturesGridRemote.subHeadline: Everything you need to submit, track, and receive your government services—all in one secure platform.
FeaturesGridRemote.feature1Description: Securely upload documents from anywhere with drag-and-drop interface, automatic format detection, and encrypted storage.
FeaturesGridRemote.feature2Description: Track your request status 24/7 with live updates, estimated completion times, and instant notifications at every step.
FeaturesGridRemote.feature3Description: Sign documents electronically with legally-binding e-signatures and receive digital copies instantly upon completion.
FeaturesGridRemote.image3Alt: Digital signature and approval confirmation screen

FeatureLarge.headline: One platform for all your government needs
FeatureLarge.feature1: Submit multiple service requests and manage everything from one dashboard.
FeatureLarge.feature2: Track all your documents in real-time with automated status notifications.
FeatureLarge.feature3: Store completed documents securely with lifetime access and easy download.
FeatureLarge.feature4: Set up renewal reminders so you never miss an expiration date.
FeatureLarge.imageAlt: Tasheel dashboard showing active government service requests

Video.headline: See how Tasheel simplifies government services
Video.description: From submitting your first request to receiving completed documents, see how Tasheel makes government services fast, transparent, and hassle-free.

Testimonials.content: Tasheel transformed how we manage employee documents. What used to take weeks of back-and-forth with government offices now happens seamlessly online. Our HR team saves 15+ hours per week, and our employees love the transparency.
Testimonials.name: Sarah Al-Mansouri

Reviews.headline: Residents and teams trust Tasheel
Reviews.subHeadline: Validated by residents, HR teams, and corporate admins across Palestine
Reviews.review1Content: I renewed my Palestinian ID card and driver's license without leaving home. Tasheel coordinated every ministry visit and delivered the approvals to my door.
Reviews.review2Content: Tasheel turns employee residency renewals into a tracked workflow. We upload, they process, and our staff stay compliant with Palestinian regulations.
Reviews.review3Content: Embassy attestations used to take weeks. Tasheel worked with the Palestinian MOFAE and secured stamped documents in four days.
Reviews.review4Content: The live status dashboard means I always know where our permits stand across the West Bank. No more chasing government offices for updates.

PricingPlans.headline: Transparent pricing for Palestinian services
PricingPlans.subHeadline: Clear NIS pricing for our most requested services. Government fees are billed at cost, and every quote includes a detailed breakdown.
PricingPlans.plan2Feature5: Free pickup across the West Bank

Footer.headline: Ready to streamline your government services?
Footer.description: Partner with Tasheel to digitize submissions, approvals, and translations while our specialists manage every government touchpoint for you.
Footer.cookieConsent: This site uses cookies to uniquely identify users and understand their needs to provide easy access and a better user experience. By continuing to use this site, you agree to our use of cookies.

FeaturesAccordion.headline: Integrations that keep requests moving
FeaturesAccordion.subHeadline: Tasheel plugs into the portals, workflows, and communication tools your team already uses.
FeaturesAccordion.feature1Content: Submit and monitor applications through Palestinian Authority portals including the Ministry of Interior eServices, Ministry of Transport, and Civil Affairs.
FeaturesAccordion.feature2Content: Collect fees through Stripe, Tap Payments, or bank transfer with automated receipts and reconciliation.
FeaturesAccordion.feature3Content: Encrypt and store passports, certificates, and attestations with granular permissions and audit trails.
FeaturesAccordion.feature4Content: Keep applicants informed with branded SMS, email, and WhatsApp alerts at each milestone.
FeaturesAccordion.feature5Content: Sync site visits and biometrics appointments with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Teams schedules.

FeaturesSlider.headline: Complete service coverage
FeaturesSlider.subHeadline: Your concierge for government, translation, legalization, and corporate filings
FeaturesSlider.feature1Description: Driver's licenses, Palestinian ID renewals, travel permits, and official certificates processed end-to-end.
FeaturesSlider.feature2Description: Certified and legal translations for contracts, medical reports, diplomas, and corporate documents.
FeaturesSlider.feature3Description: Embassy legalization, ministry attestation, and apostille support for global acceptance.
FeaturesSlider.feature4Description: Company formation, HR onboarding, payroll documents, and ongoing compliance filings.
